storyInfo:
In the core city of Chernobog, the Phantom Crossbowman who have returned are abandoned by Talulah.
Rhodes Island moves forward slowly but steadily, gradually improving their understanding of the enemy.

attributes.content: Leader.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Phantom Crossbowmen, I'm glad to see you've returned safely.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You brought so many. Are they all our people from Lungmen?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: There are so many Infected... who came back with us.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: I didn't think we'd meet you here.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: We can save a lot of lives making full use of Chernobog's resources . This core city will be our final weapon to breach Lungmen.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: What? No, my Leader...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Why was Lungmen so different from what we planned? So many of our comrades died back there for nothing!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: You dare speak to the leader like this...?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: No, he's right.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Many of our dear friends have suffered so much. The enemy left a lot of treacherous traps for us that disrupted our plans. It was a major setback.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: However, even if our pioneers faced some obstacles, the Reunion Movement will avenge them. I shall see to it that your wounds, your sacrifices, are made whole again.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Worry not. We will be with you, always.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...I hope so, Leader.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Hmm... The person you're carrying... Mephisto? Is he...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Faust sacrificed himself to save him, didn't he?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...That's right, Leader. With no regard for his own life, Faust used his Arts to cover our tracks and give us a chance to escape.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Phantom Crossbowmen, my people of Reunion... Faust will live on forever in our hearts.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Help him down. Mephisto will need to rest awhile.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I will have some men take you to camp.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Another thing, Leader... We lost contact with Crownslayer early on. We haven't heard anything from her. Don't know where she might have ended up.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: As for... Yeti Squad, and FrostNova, they... they're all...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Truly unfathomably tragic news.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Please, allow me... some time to myself.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Sarkaz, do not let them near any of our Reunion units in the city.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: How far do we go?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: All the way. See to it that they never set foot here.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Could they be hiding something, or have they been digging around? Their team must know something I don't.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Maybe... that battle was somewhat transformative. Those Arts were already exceptional, and he was not talkative.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...He cloaked himself in his silence. I thought Faust would be the one to survive.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But then, this isn't so strange either.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...Who are you?
Who am I?
What do you want?
What do I want...?
Join... you? Fight for myself?
Fight...?
Ahh, for the exalted Ursus.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Here you were supposed to be the last one standing.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Looks like the core city is back up to speed. It didn't stop for long.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: On the upside, that should have been Reunion taking in a group of Infected migrants from Lungmen. I hope...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But we may have to change up our strategy.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We can expect the city to make a few more stops along the way until the enemy commander decides to announce her plan. Then she'll stop taking in Infected refugees.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: At that time, should Wei Yenwu decide to attack, the enemy will redeploy their defensive units. We may be exposed in the process, and come under attack.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I hope our agreement with Miss Fumizuki will buy us some time from Chief Wei...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm.. we're already very close to the center of the core city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There are a lot of passages above and below us that seem like they were part of the city's transit system. After the Catastrophe, everything stopped working.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That does mean it's impossible for the city to function, and even move...? Could this be the underground structure Dr. Kal'tsit was talking about?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Regardless, these passages make good cover for us. The number of enemy guards has nearly doubled in this storage area close to the central district...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We haven't seen much resistance since entering the core city. But once we proceed to the central district, we should expect to run into a lot more Reunion forces.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The recon and spec ops teams are already in position. So far so good.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Why do we only have three teams working together?

attributes.content: The recon and spec ops teams both have their own missions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Raidian is leading the recon team for this operation, as one of Rhodes Island's communications specialists.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Thanks to Raidian, the recon team serves as the focal point for our comms in this operation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even here in the core city, we'll be able to communicate with the other teams. That's because of their hard work.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The recon team always works alone.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Outcast, Raidian, and Scout, who heroically gave his life in the Chernobog rescue mission—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The elite operators leading the recon teams are responsible for leading their squads alone, identifying and reporting threats, and attempting to resolve them without assistance.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Raidian isn't as skilled in combat as the other two elite operators, but she is a unique talent at Rhodes Island when it comes to directly influencing the course of a battle.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We've got three teams engaging in this assault operation. We don't need Raidian to trouble herself with combat.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As for the spec ops team, their mission also avoids direct combat.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Explain it to me.;......;So you're not going to tell me what it is?

attributes.content: It's enough to know that they're necessary. You'll know the details soon enough.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Each team makes up a link in the chain of our strategy. That stable structure breeds a stable result.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Conversely, a formidable opponent has a tangled and twisted root structure. They pull in nutrients from every level. Hacking off branches does them no harm.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We have to set their roots alight before they even know we're here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Huh? What are you talking about?;......;I think I get it.

attributes.content: Heh. I'm pretty sure you get it all...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'Doctor.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wait a second.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Some distant, vague feelings are coming to me.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: An orderly, unchanging flow, with no conflict.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Ironclad. And they're moving.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Reunion's... guard team. Let's avoid them and find another way...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No time to lose.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: —Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Careful. Can't you feel it?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Attention, operators... protective gear on.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...It couldn't be... Rosmontis? Are you feeling any anomalies?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm...? No. I don't think so.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: This is beyond Rosmontis's Arts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You can't rely entirely on emotions, Amiya. There is more to feel than feelings alone. When you run your fingers through a head of hair, the first thing you feel is neither longing nor joy. It's something more base than that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Base...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You can go back up to the surface from the depths, Amiya. Only you can.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Then I'll try, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Nnh... There's a sliver of... energy. And a strong scent in the air, like...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...a corpse?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, this isn't a real corpse. Could it be...? No. Oh? Why...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...It's Sarkaz. Sarkaz Arts. Thick with the smell of death... A ritual...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's an ancient ritual that runs itself after taking shape.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: These are not modern Arts. Definitely not a modern tactic.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They are. This is very unusual. The Sarkaz we know today can't perform Arts like these.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I understand what you mean, Dr. Kal'tsit. This is an ancient Sarkaz ritual, not a product of the modern science of Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Our enemy here may be of the 'purest' Sarkaz. These are techniques not known to any modern country, passed down only among ancient Sarkaz and Sargonian nomads.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...The ritual relies on Oripathy infection, and the caster's peculiar understanding of Originium.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The chaotic energy is seeping out of the Originium core, spilling out and enveloping the entire block.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can't even imagine how the potent tempest at the center of the ritual would affect a living being.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It wouldn't know the difference between friend or foe... any living thing would be slowly pulled apart by the waves of energy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It doesn't seem useful for modern combat. The cost far outweighs any potential gain.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: 'Cannibalism.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The phrasing may seem alarmist, but that's how this ritual is called.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's not surprising that the device at the center of the ritual is called an altar, considering how horrifically destructive it is. That the uninitiated refer to this as 'witchcraft.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I... I don't think ordinary Sarkaz mercenaries know how to use these kinds of Arts.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You would have to have extensive Arts knowledge and combat experience from Kazdel to be able to pull off this ritual. And you wouldn't actually need to be a caster.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But he... he's only a Kazdel Sarkaz. Not one of the descendants of the ancient Sarkaz still wandering around the world.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Dr. Kal'tsit, is this second layer of protective equipment designed to protect against the Sarkaz Arts?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not entirely. The amount of energy the ritual is producing exceeds the maximum tolerance of our equipment.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This ritual can only be completed successfully in a city lost to Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Our gear will not negate the effects of the ritual. Its power derives from antiquity, and cannot be separated from it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: All we can do is mitigate its lethality, and destroy it after clearing the area.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A Sarkaz ritual is not only a challenge to modern technology.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's almost as if it's standing to once again challenge the other civilizations of this world, as the Sarkaz have plotted throughout history.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes. But Sarkaz history is more than metaphorical.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Reunion element guarding Chernobog is not a typical group. I've said as much already.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Reunion may very well rely on 'hubs' in 'neural networks' to operate as a single unit on a large scale.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But for today's purely push-strategy driven environment, Reunion would be something of an anomaly.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Imagine if soldiers who could not deal with the Infected, with no training in how to fight Sarkaz, infiltrated the core city...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They would suffer a crushing defeat.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Right.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then... let me think...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Dr. {@nickname}, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The places where the enemy performed the Sarkaz rituals must be important locations, or critical transport hubs.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They're much more familiar with the terrain than we are. They would have mapped out all the paths long before we could... They must have had defenses in place before we even started our operation.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The only advantage we have is our intelligence. We know how they're deployed, and they know nothing about us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...So we move quickly to wipe out the enemies guarding this area. The faster we do it, the safer we'll be. Don't let them alert the other guards.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't even think about an ambush. We can't waste time here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right. I will help with the assault.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hm, okay... I think...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, look, I think, if...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: —Alright.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If you don't need my assistance, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Huh?;......;Is there something I can help with?

attributes.content: Please help Amiya command the operation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You will evaluate the progress of the battle.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Roger!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rosmontis, we're moving out!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We'll vacate the area after this battle and head to the core city surface!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rosmontis... at least it'll be sunny.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sunny~
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: (Heh. Look at them.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (The rest is up to you, Dr. {@nickname}. I know you won't let us down.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, we won't see that disappointment again.
You never step into the same river twice. There won't be a second time.
Even with the same person, the same thing... in a different time, we'll have a different outcome. This world... will change.
You believe it, don't you?
Yes... It makes sense that you wouldn't.
But I believe it. Dr. {@nickname}, a person like that... I know... if it wasn't this time right now, Dr. {@nickname} would be different.
I've seen a lot, so very many... Even if everyone else won't, I can understand.
Kal'tsit... Kal'tsit.
If... we had a little more time... you and I...
(You can prove you're not the Dr. {@nickname} that was stuck in the past.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (In this time...)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (No matter how, Dr. {@nickname}, you have to.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
